scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:py
scripts.test:py:worker: echo 'Note: Python Worker tests require wrangler dev or actual Workers deployment'
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:js:coverage && npm run test:py:coverage
scripts.coverage:open: npm run coverage:open:js && npm run coverage:open:py
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:py:fix
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:py
scripts.format:check: npm run format:js:check && npm run format:py:check
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:js && npm run typecheck:py
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run typecheck && npm test
scripts.pack:test: npm run pack:test:ts && npm run pack:test:py
scripts.pack:test:ts: npm run build && cd packages/flarelette-jwt-ts && npm pack --pack-destination ./dist && cd ../.. && node scripts/inspect-pack-ts.js
scripts.pack:test:py: cd packages/flarelette-jwt-py && py prepare.py && python -m build && cd ../.. && node scripts/inspect-pack-py.js
